title: F/S or F/T T202's - Lot Price Dropped!

posts.post_title: F/S or F/T T202's - Lot Price Dropped!
posts.post_content:
Would still like to trade these for T202, T205 or E121's that I still need OR take the lot of 11 cards for $520 shipped.  Paypal gift or mailed payment is fine.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Thanks!

Kevin

Cards Available for Trade
A Close Play at the Home Plate - Wallace / LaPorte
Hal Chase Too Late - Suggs / McLean
Hartsel Strikes Out - Groom / Gray
Jake Stahl Guarding First - Cicotte / Stahl
Lobert Almost Caught - Mattern / Kling
McConnell Caught - Richie / Needham
McIntyre at Bat - McIntyre / McConnell
